import React,{useState} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Col,Button,Form,Breadcrumb} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {savePaymentMethod} from '../actions/cartAction' const Payment = ({history}) => { const dispatch=useDispatch() const cart=useSelector(state=>state.cart) const {paymentMethod}=cart const [payMethod, setPayMethod]=useState('paypal') function handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault() dispatch(savePaymentMethod(payMethod)) history.push('/checkout') } return ( <> Cart Shipping Payment Checkout

Payment Method

Select a Payment Method setPayMethod(e.target.value)} checked />
) } export default Payment
